Michelle,

Within the Cantera/matlab/cantera directory, there should be a f=
ile 
'ctmethods.mexglx' that is created by Matlab when you run 'make'.  
So=
mehow the install process is not finding this file.  The extension 
Matlab =
gives this file is platform-specific: on a Mac it is '.mexmac', 
under Wind=
ows it is '.dll' and under linux it is '.mexglx'.  At least 
that is true f=
or my linux system, and Cantera assumes that this is the 
extension for all=
 linux systems.  Is yours creating a file with a 
different extension? Perh=
aps there is a configuration option in Matlab 
to change this extension.  I=
f not, you can edit the Makefile to change 
it manually.

If the extension =
is not the problem, check that in fact 
ctmethods.mexglx is being created b=
y Matlab during 'make'.

Hope this helps.

Dave
